title: Display Box with Kills/Deaths/Assists, Minion kills, and Game Time
body: How do you show the display box with kills/deaths/assists, minion kills, and game time at the top right corner during a game?

replies.body:
There may be an issue with your config that's causing issues with your hud display.  Try performing a reset to fix this up:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if that helps.
